briefdescription.para: This column shows a field.
This column shows action buttons.
The type of a column.
Show all features.
Show only selected features.
Show only visible features (depends on the map canvas)
Show only features whose ids are on the filter list. {.
Show only features which have unsaved changes.
The filter mode defines how the rows should be filtered.
The type of a given column.
The additional roles defined by this filter model.

detaileddescription.para: The values of these roles start just after the roles defined by QgsAttributeTableModel so they do not conflict.

briefdescription.para: Make sure, the master model is already loaded, so the selection will get synchronized.

parameterdescription.para: The QgsAttributeTableModel to use as source (mostly referred to as master model)
The mapCanvas. Used to identify the currently visible features.

briefdescription.para: Gets the index of the first column that contains an action widget.
Gets a list of currently filtered feature ids.
The current filterModel.

memberdef.argsstring: (int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role) const override
memberdef.name: headerData

briefdescription.para: Returns the layer this filter acts on.
Returns the layerCache this filter acts on.
Returns the map canvas.
Returns the table model this filter is using.
Returns the feature id for a given model index.

parameterdescription.para: A model index of the row in question

simplesect.para: The feature id of the feature visible in the provided row

briefdescription.para: Returns if selected features are currently shown on top.

simplesect.para: True if selected are shown on top

briefdescription.para: Set the attribute table configuration to control which fields are shown, in which order they are shown as well as if and where an action column is shown.
Specify a list of features, which the filter will accept.

detaileddescription.para: The filter mode will automatically be adjusted to show only these features (ShowFilteredList).

parameterdescription.para: The list of feature ids which will be accepted by the filter

briefdescription.para: Set the filter mode the filter will use.

parameterdescription.para: Sets the current mode of the filter

briefdescription.para: Changes the sort order of the features.

detaileddescription.para: If set to true, selected features will be sorted on top, regardless of the current sort column

parameterdescription.para: Specify, if selected features should be sorted on top

briefdescription.para: Set the attribute table model that backs this model.
Sort by the given column using the given order.

detaileddescription.para: Prefetches all the data from the layer to speed up sorting.

parameterdescription.para: The column which should be sorted

briefdescription.para: Sort by the given expression using the given order.

detaileddescription.para: Prefetches all the data from the layer to speed up sorting.

parameterdescription.para: The expression which should be used for sorting

briefdescription.para: The expression which is used to sort the attribute table.
Is emitted whenever the sort column is changed.
Returns true if the source row will be accepted.

parameterdescription.para: parent index in the source model

briefdescription.para: Updates the list of currently visible features on the map canvas.

detaileddescription.para: Is called automatically when the filter mode is adjusted or the extents changed.

briefdescription.para: Used by the sorting algorithm.

detaileddescription.para: Compares the two model indices. Will also consider the selection state of the feature in case selected features are to be shown on top.

briefdescription.para: Is called upon every change of the visible extents on the map canvas.

detaileddescription.para: When a change is signalled, the filter is updated and invalidated if needed.
